verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H4256>divisions<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron;<s%> <S%H5070>Nadab,<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar.<s%>

But <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1121>children:<s%> therefore <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar<s%> executed the priest's <S%H3547>office.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2505>distributed<s%> them, both <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> and <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar,<s%> according to their <S%H6486>offices<s%> in their <S%H5656>service.<s%>

And there were <S%H7227>more<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H1397>men<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar;<s%> and thus were they <S%H2505>divided.<s%> Among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> there were <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> chief <S%H7218>men<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar<s%> according to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

Thus were they <S%H2505>divided<s%> by <S%H1486>lot,<s%> one <S%H428>sort<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H428>another;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H8269>governors<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> and <S%H8269>governors<s%> of the house of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> and of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar.<s%>

And <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5417>Nethaneel<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe,<s%> one <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H3878>Levites,<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H54>Abiathar,<s%> and before the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and <S%H3881>Levites:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1>principal<s%> <S%H1004>household<s%> being <S%H270>taken<s%> for <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> and one <S%H270>taken<s%> for <S%H385>Ithamar.<s%>
Now the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H3080>Jehoiarib,<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> to <S%H3048>Jedaiah,<s%>
The <S%H7992>third<s%> to <S%H2766>Harim,<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> to <S%H8188>Seorim,<s%>
The <S%H2549>fifth<s%> to <S%H4441>Malchijah,<s%> the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> to <S%H4326>Mijamin,<s%>
The <S%H7637>seventh<s%> to <S%H6976>Hakkoz,<s%> the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> to <S%H29>Abijah,<s%>
The <S%H8671>ninth<s%> to <S%H3442>Jeshua,<s%> the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> to <S%H7935>Shecaniah,<s%>
The <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H475>Eliashib,<s%> the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H3356>Jakim,<s%>
The <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H2647>Huppah,<s%> the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H3428>Jeshebeab,<s%>
The <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H1083>Bilgah,<s%> the <S%H8337>sixteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H564>Immer,<s%>
The <S%H7651>seventeenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H2387>Hezir,<s%> the <S%H8083>eighteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H6483>Aphses,<s%>
The <S%H8672>nineteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> to <S%H6611>Pethahiah,<s%> the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> to <S%H3168>Jehezekel,<s%>
The <S%H259>one<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> to <S%H3199>Jachin,<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> to <S%H1577>Gamul,<s%>
The <S%H7969>three<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> to <S%H1806>Delaiah,<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> to <S%H4590>Maaziah.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> were the <S%H6486>orderings<s%> of them in their <S%H5656>service<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> according to their <S%H4941>manner,<s%> <S%H3027>under<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> their <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him.

And the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> were these: Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6019>Amram;<s%> <S%H7619>Shubael:<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7619>Shubael;<s%> <S%H3165>Jehdeiah.<s%>
Concerning <S%H7345>Rehabiah:<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7345>Rehabiah,<s%> the <S%H7218>first<s%> was <S%H3449>Isshiah.<s%>
Of the <S%H3325>Izharites;<s%> <S%H8013>Shelomoth:<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8013>Shelomoth;<s%> <S%H3189>Jahath.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Hebron; <S%H3404>Jeriah<s%> the first, <S%H568>Amariah<s%> the <S%H8145>second,<s%> <S%H3166>Jahaziel<s%> the <S%H7992>third,<s%> <S%H3360>Jekameam<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth.<s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5816>Uzziel;<s%> <S%H4318>Michah:<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4318>Michah;<s%> <S%H8069>Shamir.<s%>
The <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H4318>Michah<s%> was <S%H3449>Isshiah:<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3449>Isshiah;<s%> <S%H2148>Zechariah.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> were <S%H4249>Mahli<s%> and <S%H4187>Mushi:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3269>Jaaziah;<s%> <S%H1121>Beno.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> by <S%H3269>Jaaziah;<s%> <S%H1121>Beno,<s%> and <S%H7719>Shoham,<s%> and <S%H2139>Zaccur,<s%> and <S%H5681>Ibri.<s%>
Of <S%H4249>Mahli<s%> came <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> who <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1121>sons.<s%>
Concerning <S%H7027>Kish:<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%> was <S%H3396>Jerahmeel.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> also of <S%H4187>Mushi;<s%> <S%H4249>Mahli,<s%> and <S%H5740>Eder,<s%> and <S%H3406>Jerimoth.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> after the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

These <S%H1992><s%> <S%H1571>likewise<s%> <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> over <S%H5980>against<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> and <S%H288>Ahimelech,<s%> and the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> even the <S%H7218>principal<s%> <S%H1>fathers<s%> over <S%H5980>against<s%> their <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H251>brethren.<s%>
